claim: Flublok ensures identical antigenic match with WHO- and FDA-selected flu strains.
explanation: Title page of an original article showing the title 'Recombinant or Standard-Dose Influenza Vaccine in Adults under 65 Years of Age' and a list of authors; no data, figures, or text on antigenic matching are visible. does not support the claim because the image shows only the article title and authors without any information on Flublok antigenic match or WHO/FDA strain selection Note: Only the title and author information are visible; no substantive content or results are shown
